products.title: TURO's Budapest
products.description: TURO's Budapest costume cat has a modern fit cut. The jacket has pockets with flaps and a chest pocket, four decorative buttons on the cuffs and two slits on the back hem.

products.title: The classically elegant suit
products.description: The classically elegant suit is made of comfortable wool and mohair. The suit jacket has a chest pocket and two pockets with flaps. The back has slits. The suit jacket is closed with two buttons, the cuffs have decorative buttons. Inside there is a blue, glossy lined fabric and three pockets.

products.title: Tiger of Sweden's narrow-lined suit jacket
products.description: Tiger of Sweden's narrow-lined suit jacket has a single-row buttoning, a lightly supported shoulder line and a narrow notched collar with two buttonholes. There is a chest pocket on the front and button-through pockets with lids, a smooth lining and three chest pockets on the inside. The hem has two slits at the back and decorative buttons at the cuffs.
